GSD.description:
Revert "nbd: fix possible overflow on 'first_minor' in nbd_dev_add()"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 9d73b40f979737029bac724c39648016da3f914c. For more details please see the references link.
